title: Live Stream: The Colours of Myria [G] (Valid from 19 Feb, 8pm - 5 Mar 2021, 11.59pm)
synopsis:
In the mesmerizingly colorful town of Myria, the townspeople celebrate music and color everyday--until they wake up one drab, pallid morning. The world is cold and grey, and the memory of music is slowly disappearing! Enter the intrepid David and Jocelyn, and a mysterious, talking coconut who might hold the key to solving this dire problem. Will they restore music and colors to Myria?â€‹

Featured in this musical storytelling are two well known and loved Singaporean artists, David Loke and Jonathan Shin! Join us as we explore the fascinating tale of Myria, narrated by Jonathan, and performed by 100 musicians from all over the world! This diverse group of musicians will collaborate and put up a spectacular performance, with pieces arranged by David.

Special thanks to
Nicole Benedetti
and
Yume Fujise

The Purple Symphony
Jonathan Shin
David Loke Kai Yuan
Shuxiang Yang
Jocelyn Ng Jinghui

details.streaming_details:
SISTIC Live stream on 19 Feb 2021.
Show begins at 8pm, viewable until 5 Mar 2021 11.59pm.
